node.name: SQL Lesson
node.rich_text:
ntlm info
nmap <target> -p1433 --script ms-sql-ntlm-info --script-args ms.sql.instance-port=1433
The NTLM protocol is used for various security-related functions, including authentication during network logon and the establishment of secure communication channels.
This command will perform an Nmap scan against the specified target on port 1433, using the
script to gather information about the Microsoft SQL Server.
